title: Watch-tower, Corner of Spring and Varick Streets, New York
provenance: Gift of Mrs. Cora E. Wilson
medium: Wood engraving printed in black ink on paper
description: Upright page containing five scenes:  At top is the interior of an observation room with a seated man in uniform looking through a telescope; at center below is a view of a circular staircase and a platform with a large bell; at lower left is a view of the whoe tower; and at lower right is a man ringing a bell and a fire engine going through a street during the night;
name: Print
